description.raw:
I'm assuming that `cloudsim-options.json` will have this kind of content for a payload:
~~~
{
  "token": "<redacted>",
  "role" : "payload",
  "client_route" : "https://devkeys.cloudsim.io/tap/sasc/client/vpn-003",
  "server_ip" : "111.222.3.4",
  "client_id" : "myClient2"
}
~~~

and this kind of content for an arbiter:
~~~
{
  "token": "<redacted>",
  "role" : "arbiter",
  "blue_route" : "https://devkeys.cloudsim.io/tap/sasc/server/vpn-003",
  "gold_route" : "https://devkeys.cloudsim.io/tap/sasc/server/vpn-004",
  "blue_subnet" : "192.168.2",
  "gold_subnet" : "192.168.3"
}
~~~
